scripts.build:lib: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:css && npm run build:copy-build-files

devDependencies.@babel/core: main dependency that includes babel transform script
devDependencies.@babel/preset-env: allows transpilation from latest ES2015 + features to ES5 & configures the polyfills automatically
devDependencies.@babel/preset-react: allows transforming JSX and React class syntax into valid JavaScript code
devDependencies.babel-loader: allows Webpack to transpile JS code via Babel, will be invoked from webpack config
devDependencies.html-webpack-plugin: loads the html template and outputs it at build time
devDependencies.node-sass: Sass compiler used by the sass loader
devDependencies.style-loader: creates style tags from JS strings
devDependencies.webpack: which include all core webpack functionality
devDependencies.webpack-cli: enable running webpack from the command line
devDependencies.webpack-dev-server: this development server automatically rerun webpack when our file is changed
devDependencies.mini-css-extract-plugin: used to move the css into seprate files instead of in the bundle
